channel.title: Create a Download Page on Website
channel.description:
We need a page on website to put download links(button) for the [GUI](https://github.com/mesg-foundation/gui).
GUI is a desktop application and we have different builds for Mac, Linux & Windows for each release. We should be detecting user's OS from their Browser props and chose the appropriate build link automatically and have a button in the page to make it possible to download.
GUI application has a GUI and it install everything that MESG needs to run under the hood. So this is an all-in-one application and very useful for everybody that uses and develops with MESG.
I'm thinking about having a URL like this `https://mesg.com/download`.
/cc @Nicolas /cc @emmanuel need some help for the design :)
